item.title: 安装.net framework 3.5错误
item.description: 问题 我在官方下了一个.net framework 3.5,可是安装的时候说 Visual C++ Runtime Library runtime error. This application has requested the runtime to terminate it in an unusual way.Please contact the application’s support team for more information. 后面来弹
